column5: Anyone know if you need a hub kit or anything to run a Merc Laser 2 on a Yamaha post '84 115?

I know on Mercs Flo-Torque props have hubs available for Yammy engines. Don't know if the ones with the integral hub will fit though. The Laser has the Flo-Torque hub correct?  See different hubs here:  http://www.westmarine.com/buy/mercury-marine--flo-torq-ii-hub-kits-and-components--P006_190_002_541
